casebody.data:
Randy Lee HAMMITT and Sandra Marie Hammitt
v.
David S. CAYER, Senior Resident Judge of Mecklenburg County, North Carolina and presiding Judge of Superior Court of Gaston County. No. 272P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 26, 2005. Randy Lee Hammitt, Pro Se. Peter Wendt, for Other. David S. Cayer, Senior Resident Judge, for David S. Cayer.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioners on the 24th day of May 2005 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Gaston County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of May 2005."
